title: 2 Pack Crystal Glass Door Knob Set, Passage Door Knobs for Hall and Closet, Keyless Square Crystal Door Knobs with Satin Nickel Finish, Interior Door Knobs Non-Locking Set, Passage Function

Crystal Glass Door Knob Set, Privacy Door Knob for Bedroom and Bathroom, Mordern Square Crystal Door Knob with Lock, Satin Nickel Finish
Crystal Glass Door Knob Set, Passage Door Knob for Hall and Closet, Keyless Square Crystal Door Knob, Interior Door Knob Non-Locking Set, Satin Nickel Finish
Privacy sets are used on bathroom and bedroom doors. Locked by turning a button on the inside and can be unlocked in case of emergency from outside by turning the slotted button using a flat object.☘
Passage sets are typically used on closet doors, bedrooms and other doors that you want to latch but do not lock
